all_results.question: A researcher is experimenting with nerve transmission using neurons from a giant squid. At the beginning of the experiment, the axon is at rest and has a threshold measured at –70 mV at 37oC. The axon receives one stimulus that triggers one action potential in the axon. choices.A: The axon becomes hyperpolarized to –90 mV.
choices.B: The axon becomes hyperpolarized to –50 mV.
choices.C: The strength of the action potential becomes greater.
choices.D: The frequency of the action potential increases.
